About the Company: Onesource Techmedia Ltd provides media and entertainment contents. It aggregates and markets audio/video and movie contents of various languages in local and international markets; and acquires old movie rights and dub in different languages and markets to various television channels. The company also produces animation films/short movies/documentary movies as per the requirements of clients/temples; and produces and markets animation movies and television serials, movies, etc. Onesource Techmedia Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Chennai, India.
